website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer a makeup remover in the form of a towelette, this Clinique option is a perfect one.
pros: 50 ready-to-go, saturated towelettes gently remove makeup on your face and eyes
Saturated with gentle micellar cleansing liquid
cons: Some had a burning sensation in their eyes when used to remove eye makeup

customer_reviews.title: What I liked the best is that they did a decent job ...
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the best is that they did a decent job removing makeup from my face. What I did not like at all is that I could not use for eye makeup as they really burned. Also, it would’ve been helpful if the towelettes were pop up as, more often than not, more than one got pulled out at a time-especially as I got halfway into the pkg. One more thing, thought they were a bit thin-would not order again. But like other Clinique products.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Beller

customer_reviews.title: Okay to use on eyes, not a cleanser just removes  top layer..
customer_reviews.text: The wipes serve their, however, You have to use more than 1 get most makeup removed-- it's good that several come in the package. Remove gently because skin will feel irritated if rub to harshly. I like the longer length of wipes, the scent which is frresh, and the resealing feature that helps maintain moisture of wipes. My favorite thing about the wipes is they can be used for the entire face yes the EYES too!!! In the future I would purchase the liquid form in bottle amd use cotton balls to remove makeup better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite wipe out there! Not overly saturated, usually need 2 to get the job done which I’m fine with, makes me feel clean! Have been using for years! I have very sensitive and breakout prone skin, these have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Mollyderose

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Purchase Again!
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as effective at removing mascara as the bottled liquid. I actually think the towelettes will probably dry out and be totally useless if not used quickly. Already, I must add liquid remover to them in order for them to remove my mascara adequately.
customer_reviews.author: AMD Huntsville

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift . My wife loves these so don't stop making them . If you do discontinue this product then give me notice so as I can stock up . Happy wife happy life .
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: These are good. A little disappointed with the number of wipes in a package especially because they are pretty thin and need more than one a night.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: Clinique is ALWAYS the best!!! How can you go wrong with having their already fabulous eye makeup remover in a convenient wipe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite facial wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new night time facial cleanser. I used others for years. Bought these on a whim. They are the best I have ever used. If you think of the price compared to others it is not much more. Well worth a few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Heiden

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin and was concerned that I might have an adverse reaction but these are great! Glad I got them
customer_reviews.text: First time I've tried Clinique's Take Off the Day. I'm impressed! I have sensitive skin and was concerned that I might have an adverse reaction but these are great! Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Thorough
customer_reviews.text: These wipes take off all my makeup— even waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Take off your makeup easier with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product that makes taking off my makeup so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful for everyday use. Takes all makeup and mascara off, waterproof or not. Very gentle on the skin. Not really a scent. I would highly recommend them and can't live without them.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha L

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these Clinique wipes for a long time and usually buy them at a reputable deptarment store and have never had an issue with them. I decided to try ordering them through Amazon and will not do that again. The wipes i received are dry, thinner, and they have a bad (stale) smell to them. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No perfume.
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique and these wipes they do a great job and has no scent.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are so great, I love that they aren’t too rough on my skin. Takes my entire face of makeup off with one wipe.
customer_reviews.author: CharliGnarly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! I use 2 a night, one for eyes, one for face. Kind of pricey but hasn't made my face break out as I have large pores.. Clinique never lets me down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much less messy than its balm counterpart...just wish more than 50 wipes came in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: H. G. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Burns facial skin
customer_reviews.text: This product burns my facial skin, other than that it does take off eye makeup. I was expecting a non burning wipe from Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Gourmetmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: Not real. No smell and takes forever to remove makeup
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rovinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I continue to buy and I have found no adequate substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm every time. Fast and easy way to cleanse your face. FRAGRANCE FREE!
customer_reviews.author: Brian DavisAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes, they get all the makeup off easily. Probably my favorite makeup wipes ever.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not new - came packaged in a ziploc bag
customer_reviews.text: The makeup remover wipes I received were packaged in a ziploc bag. Clearly someone was reselling these. Gross!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen S.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for some time, disappointed the wipes are not as most as they should be!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aundria E. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: The beat wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best face wipes I have ever used. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, We Have a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have very fair and somewhat sensitive skin, so I’m prone to blemishes and they easily show these wipes are gentle enough not to irritate my skin but strong enough to get my makeup (even mascara) off! Other wipes I’ve tried (even from “fancy” places like Rodan & Fields) tend to irritate my skin, especially the eye area, because I tend to have to “scrub” to remove my makeup. Bottom line: if you’re looking for a effective cleansing and makeup remover wipe that doesn’t leave your skin raw/tender, purchase these!!
customer_reviews.author: ClaryTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup remover/cleansing towelette.
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a beauty stylist at a department store as a great makeup remover/cleanser. I bought them for the first time before I had jaw surgery and knew I wouldn't be able to really wash my face for a few weeks. They did a great job cleansing as I recovered. Now they are the only towelettes I use to remove my makeup. They are gentle yet effective and leave your skin feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: thart

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I just found this brand and love them. The wetness is perfect and they do not irritate my skin. I really like the way they clean. These are my new go too wipes for removing everything at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: TracyDee

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Clinique products and these wipes do not disappoint. They take your makeup off easily and with little effort. They do have a somewhat weird smell, but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product does just what it says! Its pretty simple, swipes your makeup from the day right off! Way easier then using a wash cloth and scrubbing your face until it is red.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Salsman

customer_reviews.title: Clinique makeup wipes! Work super.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They clean my face really well. I use them every night. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I like these wipes! Ihave used the liquid for years and these wipes are the best thing for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Shes A Kick

customer_reviews.title: Love these for on the go
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a quick wipe off of mascara I really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kismet

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: These are pure, easy to use, quality of Clinique, and can travel well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Some of the beat makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes for taking off my face and eye makeup. I prefer the liquid version usually but this was helpful when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My son got sunscreen in his eye and used one and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and work really well taking make up off. My son got sunscreen in his eye and used one and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: mak

customer_reviews.title: Just paying for the Clinique name
customer_reviews.text: Not worth xtra money oil of olay from drugstore jst as goid for 1/4 the cost
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Cloths are on the dry side but they work
customer_reviews.text: Cloths are on the dry side. Cloths are a little hard to remove without taking out a second one. They work so it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: S.L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for taking off your mascara. I also like to take them camping to help clean my skin
customer_reviews.author: kathy larson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product. She has extremely sensitive skin and this make-up remover doesn't unset her skin. It's also much less expensive then buying at Macy's!!
customer_reviews.author: LBoatman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to take my eye makeup off, not harsh or scented and does the trick!!
customer_reviews.author: kbrumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it♥️.. fresh and removes all the make up with at more 2 wipes. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Astride

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, I received 10 ct wipes instead of 50 ct wipes as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Ablewis07

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! They do a good job of removing makeup and don’t leave my face feeling oily.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: CLINIQUE Take The Day Off Micellar Cleansing Towelettes for Face & Eyes
product_meta.description: These handy wipes from Clinique are perfect for any situation, whether your at home, at the gym or travelling these wipes are quick and easy to use and require no water. There gentle enough to cause no irritation to the skin or eye area.
